name: Escape (itch) (VengeurK)
description:
In this game you are a prisoner and are trying to escape the prison. The gameplay is simple and hardcore in the sense that the interface is minimal and one hit is one kill.

To successfuly escpae, you will have to cleverly take out the guards and hide from them to only engage as few as possible at a time.

Tutorial Level
ShootingGetting killedStealth Stabbing a guard

More content and features will come in the comming weeks.
